channel.title: Wicked stuff need help pl0x
channel.description:
i managed to fix the run server problem but i got another one
i compile ... runserver ...
i want to log in on 127.0.0.1
my serverrunner says zenzo signed in
but my screen contains black but you see the message scroll
after 10secs it says connetcion lost attempting to restablish ...

item.title: Wicked stuff need help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

I’ll get warned for repeatedly helping people solve their server problems? o.O

Read full topic

item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

son watch dont post to many times, you can get warned for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Wicked stuff need help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

sounds like you have something that spawns, that keeps your map from loading. You should check to see if your starting area doesn’t have a global object/item or npc that spawns and isn’t coded into your serverbase. It’s like spawning an item that you can’t use but equipping it anyway and it disconnects you. Or using ::Pnpc to change into an npc that the server doesn’t recognize and it disconnects you and anyone who’s in visual range of you.

Read full topic
